message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $12,000 to you at a competitive price. I believe this offer presents a fair deal for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate the offer but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is still a fair price considering the value to me, and it gives you a good profit margin as well.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a compromise. In light of this, I would like to offer the product to you for $11,000. This price still allows for a reasonable profit while acknowledging your valuation of the product.
